mutants.original_line: """Returns a list of words containing the character 'e'."""
return [word for word in word_list if 'e' in word]
mutants.mutated_line: return [word for word in word_list if 'e' not in word]

mutants.original_line: return [word for word in word_list if 'e' in word]
mutants.mutated_line: return [word for word in word_list if '' in word]
